landing.h2-heading: Tangu 2014, zaidi ya wahitimu 40,000 wa freeCodeCamp.org wamepata kazi katika kampuni za teknolojia ikijumuisha:
landing.hero-img-description: wanafunzi wa freeCodeCamp katika kikundi cha mafunzo nchini Korea Kusini.

testimonials.heading: Hivi ndivyo wahitimu wetu wanasema kuhusu freeCodeCamp:

shawn.testimony: "Inatisha kubadili taaluma. Nilipata tu kujiamini kwamba ningeweza kuweka msimbo kwa kufanya kazi kwa mamia ya saa za masomo ya bure kwenye freeCodeCamp. Ndani ya mwaka mmoja nilikuwa na kazi ya takwimu sita kama Mhandisi wa Programu. freeCodeCamp ilibadilisha maisha yangu."

sarah.testimony: "freeCodeCamp ilikuwa lango la kazi yangu kama msanidi programu. Mtaala ulioandaliwa vyema ulichukua ujuzi wangu wa usimbaji kutoka kiwango cha wanaoanza hadi kiwango cha uhakika sana. Ilikuwa kila kitu nilichohitaji ili kupata kazi yangu ya kwanza katika kampuni ya ajabu."

emma.testimony: "Siku zote nimekuwa nikijitahidi kujifunza JavaScript. Nimesoma kozi nyingi lakini kozi ya freeCodeCamp ndiyo iliyokwama. Kusoma JavaScript pamoja na miundo ya data na algoriti katika freeCodeCamp kulinipa ujuzi na kujiamini niliyohitaji kupata kazi yangu ya ndoto kama mhandisi wa programu huko Spotify."

landing.certification-heading: Pata vyeti vilivyoidhinishwa bila malipo katika:

faqs.question: freeCodeCamp ni nini hasa?
answer: freeCodeCamp ni jumuiya ya watu kutoka duniani kote ambao wanajifunza kuandika msimbo kwa pamoja. Sisi ni shirika la hisani la 501(c)(3) la umma.

faqs.question: Je, freeCodeCamp itanisaidiaje kujifunza kuweka msimbo?
answer: Utajifunza kuandika msimbo kwa kuunda miradi mingi, hatua kwa hatua, kwenye kivinjari chako, kihariri cha msimbo au programu ya simu.
Pia utapata vyeti vilivyoidhinishwa bila malipo ukiendelea.

faqs.question: Je, freeCodeCamp ni bure kweli?
answer: Ndiyo. Kila kipengele cha freeCodeCamp hakina malipo 100%. Kozi, miradi, na hata vyeti.

faqs.question: Je, freeCodeCamp inaweza kunisaidia kupata kazi kama msanidi programu?
answer: Ndiyo. Kila mwaka, maelfu ya watu wanaojiunga na jumuiya ya freeCodeCamp hupata kazi yao ya kwanza ya msanidi programu.

faqs.question: Je, nitajifunza ujuzi gani?
answer: Utajifunza ujuzi ambao watengenezaji wengi hutumia kwenye kazi: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Linux, Git, SQL, na zaidi. Pia utajifunza jinsi ya kutumia maktaba zenye nguvu kwa ajili ya ukuzaji wa wavuti, ukuzaji wa programu ya simu, sayansi ya data na artificial intelligence.

faqs.question: Inachukua muda gani kujifunza haya yote?
answer: freeCodeCamp inajiendesha yenyewe. Kwa kweli, inaweza kuchukua miaka kadhaa ya kufanya mazoezi ya kuandika misimbo ili kujifunza ujuzi huu wa kutosha ili kupata kazi kama mhandisi wa programu. Usiache shule au kazi yako ya mchana hadi ujisikie tayari.

faqs.question: Je, nitaanzaje?
answer: Ikiwa wewe ni mwanzilishi, unapaswa kuanza mwanzoni mwa mtaala wa msingi wa freeCodeCamp. Ikiwa una maendeleo zaidi, bado tunapendekeza kuanzia mwanzo, lakini unaweza kuruka hadi eneo lolote unalotaka.

faqs.question: Je, ninapataje vyeti vilivyoidhinishwa bila malipo?
answer: Kwa kila uidhinishaji, unahitaji kujenga miradi yake 5 ya uthibitishaji, na kupata majaribio yote ya mradi ili uweze kudai cheti chako.

faqs.question: Sioni [jina la zana] kwenye mtaala wa msingi wa freeCodeCamp.
answer: Kando na mtaala wa msingi wa freeCodeCamp, Tuna maelfu ya vitabu, kozi na mafunzo ya kuprogramu bila malipo, yenye urefu kamili. Kwa hakika tunafundisha zana zozote za programu unazotaka kujifunza. Tumia tu upau wa utafutaji.

settings.share-projects: Shiriki miradi yako isiyo ya bure yaCodeCamp, makala, au maombi ya kuvuta yaliyokubaliwa.
settings.privacy: Mipangilio katika sehemu hii hukuwezesha kudhibiti kile kinachoonyeshwa kwenye jalada lako la umma la freeCodeCamp. Bonyeza save ili kuhifadhi mabadiliko yako.
settings.data: Ili kuona ni data gani tunayoshikilia kwenye akaunti yako, bofya kitufe cha "Pakua data yako" hapa chini
settings.disabled: Uidhinishaji wako utafichwa ukiwekwa kuwa wa faragha.
settings.private-name: Jina lako halitaonekana kwenye vyeti vyako ikiwa hii itawekwa kuwa ya faragha.
settings.claim-legacy: Ukishajishindia vyeti vifuatavyo vya freeCodeCamp, utaweza kudai {{cert}}:
settings.sound-mode: Hii inaongeza sauti ya kupendeza ya gitaa la akustika kwenye tovuti. Utapata maoni ya muziki unapoandika kwenye kihariri, unapokamilisha changamoto, unapopata cheti na zaidi.
settings.scrollbar-width: Upana wa Upau wa kusogeza wa Kihariri

username.contains invalid characters: Jina la mtumiaji "{{username}}" lina vibambo batili
username.is too short: Jina la mtumiaji "{{username}}" ni fupi mno
username.is a reserved error code: Jina la mtumiaji "{{username}}" ni msimbo wa hitilafu uliohifadhiwa
username.must be lowercase: Jina la mtumiaji "{{username}}" lazima liwe herufi ndogo
username.change: Tafadhali kumbuka, kubadilisha jina lako la mtumiaji pia kutabadilisha URL kwa wasifu wako na uthibitishaji wako.

labels.name: Jina
labels.title: Cheo
labels.keyboard-shortcuts: Wezesha Njia za Mkato za Kibodi

danger.heading: Eneo la Hatari
danger.be-careful: Tafadhali kuwa makini. Mabadiliko katika sehemu hii ni ya kudumu.
danger.delete-p1: Hii itafuta data yako yote, ikijumuisha maendeleo yako yote na maelezo ya akaunti.
danger.delete-p2: Hatutaweza kurejesha yoyote yake baadaye, hata ukibadilisha nia yako.
danger.delete-p3: Ikiwa kuna jambo ambalo tunaweza kufanya vyema zaidi, tutumie barua pepe badala yake na tutafanya tuwezavyo: <0>{{email}}</0>
danger.certain: Nina uhakika 100%. Futa kila kitu kinachohusiana na akaunti hii
danger.reset-p1: Hii itafuta maendeleo yako yote, pointi, changamoto zilizokamilishwa, rekodi zetu za miradi yako, vyeti vyovyote ulizo nazo na kila kitu.
danger.reset-p2: Hatutaweza kurejesha yoyote yake baadaye, hata ukibadilisha nia yako.
danger.nevermind-2: Usijali, sitaki kufuta maendeleo yangu yote
danger.reset-confirm: Weka upya kila kitu. Nataka kuanza tena mwanzo

email.missing: Huna barua pepe inayohusishwa na akaunti hii.
email.heading: Mipangilio ya Barua pepe
email.check: Tafadhali angalia barua pepe yako, au <0>omba barua pepe mpya ya uthibitishaji hapa</0>.
email.weekly: Nitumie barua pepe ya kila wiki ya Quincy

honesty.p1: Kabla ya kudai cheti kilichothibitishwa, ni lazima ukubali Ahadi yetu ya Uaminifu ya Kiakademia, ambayo inasomeka:
honesty.p2: "Ninaelewa kuwa wizi wa maandishi unamaanisha kunakili kazi ya mtu mwingine na kuwasilisha kazi hiyo kana kwamba ni yangu mwenyewe, bila kuhusisha waziwazi mwandishi asilia."
honesty.p3: "Ninaelewa kuwa wizi ni kitendo cha kukosa uaminifu na kwamba kwa kawaida watu hufukuzwa chuo kikuu au kufukuzwa kazi ikiwa watakamatwa wakiiba."
honesty.p4: "Aside from using open source libraries such as jQuery and Bootstrap, and short snippets of code which are clearly attributed to their original author, 100% of the code in my projects was written by me, or along with another person going through the freeCodeCamp curriculum with whom I was pair programming in real time."
honesty.p5: "I pledge that I did not plagiarize any of my freeCodeCamp.org work. I understand that freeCodeCamp.org’s team will audit my projects to confirm this."
honesty.p6: In the situations where we discover instances of unambiguous plagiarism, we will replace the person in question’s certification with a message that "Upon review, this account has been flagged for academic dishonesty."
honesty.p7: As an academic institution that grants achievement-based certifications, we take academic honesty very seriously. If you have any questions about this policy, or suspect that someone has violated it, you can email <0>{{email}}</0> and we will investigate.

profile.you-not-public: You have not made your portfolio public.
profile.username-not-public: {{username}} has not made their portfolio public.
profile.you-change-privacy: You need to change your privacy setting in order for your portfolio to be seen by others. This is a preview of how your portfolio will look when made public.
profile.username-change-privacy: {{username}} needs to change their privacy setting in order for you to view their portfolio.
profile.no-certs: No certifications have been earned under the current curriculum
profile.none-completed: No challenges have been completed yet.
profile.add-linkedin: Add this certification to my LinkedIn profile
profile.tweet: I just earned the {{certTitle}} certification @freeCodeCamp! Check it out here: {{certURL}}

footer.tax-exempt-status: freeCodeCamp is a donor-supported tax-exempt 501(c)(3) charitable organization (United States Federal Tax Identification Number: 82-0779546)
footer.mission-statement: Our mission: to help people learn to code for free. We accomplish this by creating thousands of videos, articles, and interactive coding lessons - all freely available to the public. We also have thousands of freeCodeCamp study groups around the world.
footer.donation-initiatives: Donations to freeCodeCamp go toward our education initiatives, and help pay for servers, services, and staff.
footer.donate-text: You can <1>make a tax-deductible donation here</1>.

learn.heading: Welcome to freeCodeCamp's curriculum.
learn.start-at-beginning: Ikiwa wewe ni mgeni katika coding, tunapendekeza <0>uanze mwanzo</0>.

read-this.heading: Tafadhali punguza mwendo na usome hii.
read-this.p1: freeCodeCamp ni njia iliyothibitishwa kwa kazi yako ya kwanza ya msanidi programu.
read-this.p2: Zaidi ya watu 40,000 wamepata kazi za wasanidi programu baada ya kukamilisha hili - ikiwa ni pamoja na katika makampuni makubwa kama Google na Microsoft.
read-this.p3: Iwapo wewe ni mgeni katika upangaji programu, tunapendekeza uanze mwanzoni na upate uidhinishaji huu kwa mpangilio.
read-this.p4: Ili kupata kila cheti, unda miradi yake 5 inayohitajika na upitie majaribio yake yote.
read-this.p5: Unaweza kuongeza vyeti hivi kwenye wasifu wako au LinkedIn. Lakini muhimu zaidi kuliko vyeti ni mazoezi unayopata njiani.
read-this.p6: Ikiwa unahisi kuzidiwa, hiyo ni kawaida. Programming ni ngumu.
read-this.p7: Mazoezi ni ufunguo. Fanya mazoezi, fanya mazoezi, fanya mazoezi.
read-this.p8: Na mtaala huu utakupa maelfu ya masaa ya mazoezi ya programu kwa mikono.
read-this.p9: Na kama ungependa kujifunza zaidi nadharia ya hisabati na sayansi ya kompyuta, pia tuna maelfu ya saa za kozi za video kwenye <0>kituo cha YouTube cha freeCodeCamp</0>.
read-this.p10: Ikiwa unataka kupata kazi ya msanidi programu au wateja wa kujitegemea, ujuzi wa programu utakuwa sehemu tu ya fumbo. Pia unahitaji kujenga mtandao wako wa kibinafsi na sifa yako kama msanidi programu.
read-this.p11: Unaweza kufanya hivi kwenye LinkedIn na GitHub, na pia kwenye <0>jukwaa la freeCodeCamp</0>.

learn.wrong-answer: Samahani, hilo si jibu sahihi. Jaribu tena?
learn.check-answer: Bofya kitufe kilicho hapa chini ili kuangalia jibu lako.
learn.question: Swali
learn.submit-and-go: Wasilisha na uende kwa changamoto inayofuata
learn.congratulations: Hongera, code yako imepita. Wasilisha code yako ili kuendelea.
learn.test-output: Matokeo ya jaribio lako yataenda hapa
learn.sign-in-save: Ingia katika akaunti ili kuhifadhi maendeleo yako
learn.project-complete: Imekamilisha miradi ya uthibitishaji ya {{completedChallengesInBlock}} kati ya {{totalChallengesInBlock}}}
learn.tried-rsa: Ikiwa tayari umejaribu mbinu ya <0>Soma-Tafuta-Uliza</0>, basi unaweza kuomba usaidizi kwenye jukwaa la freeCodeCamp.
learn.rsa-forum: Kabla ya kutengeneza chapisho jipya tafadhali angalia kama swali lako <0>tayari limejibiwa kwenye mijadala.
learn.reset-warn: Je, una uhakika ungependa kuanza upya somo hili? Vihariri na majaribio vitawekwa upya.
learn.scrimba-tip: Kidokezo: Ikiwa kivinjari kidogo kinafunika msimbo, bofya na uburute ili kuisogeza. Pia, jisikie huru kusimamisha na kuhariri msimbo katika video wakati wowote.

editor-alerts.tab-trapped: Kubonyeza tab kutaingiza herufi ya tab
editor-alerts.tab-free: Kubonyeza tab kutasogeza mkazo hadi kwenye kipengee kinachoweza kuangaziwa

learn.project-preview-title: Hapa kuna muonyesho wa kile utakachounda
learn.github-required: <0>Unda akaunti ya GitHub</0> ikiwa huna akaunti. Utaihitaji unapounda mashine ya seva ya Linux. Mchakato huu unaweza kuchukua dakika chache.
learn.submit-public-url: Ukimaliza mradi, hifadhi faili zote zinazohitajika kwenye hazina ya umma na uwasilishe URL yake hapa chini.
learn.complete-both-steps: Kamilisha hatua zote mbili hapa chini ili kumaliza changamoto.
learn.runs-in-vm: Mradi unaendeshwa kwa mashine virtual, kamilisha mazoezi za watumiaji zilizofafanuliwa hapo na upate majaribio yote ya kupita ili kumaliza hatua ya 1.
learn.sorry-try-again: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Jaribu tena.
learn.sorry-keep-trying: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Zidi kujaribu.
learn.sorry-getting-there: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Unafika huko.
learn.sorry-hang-in-there: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Subiri hapo.
learn.sorry-dont-giveup: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Usikate tamaa.
learn.season-greetings-fcc: Salamu za Msimu kutoka kwa jumuiya ya freeCodeCamp 🎉
learn.if-getting-value: Ikiwa unapata mengi kutoka kwa freeCodeCamp, sasa ni wakati mzuri wa kuchangia ili kusaidia kazi yetu ya kutoa msaada.
learn.building-a-university: Tunaunda Programu ya Bila Malipo wa Shahada ya Chuo Kikuu ya Computer Science
learn.if-help-university: Tayari tumepiga hatua kubwa. Saidia hisani yetu kwa safari ndefu ya mbele.

donate.title: Unga mkono hisani yetu
donate.additional: Unaweza kutoa mchango wa ziada wa mara moja wa kiasi chochote ukitumia kiungo hiki: <0>{{url}}</0>
donate.error: Hitilafu fulani imetokea kwenye mchango wako.
donate.error-2: Kuna jambo lisilo sawa. Tafadhali wasiliana na donors@freecodecamp.org
donate.free-tech: Michango yako itasaidia elimu ya teknolojia bila malipo kwa watu duniani kote.
donate.no-halo: Ikiwa huoni mwanga wa dhahabu karibu na picha yako ya wasifu, wasiliana na donors@freecodecamp.org.
donate.confirm-2: Thibitisha mchango wako wa mara moja wa ${{usd}}
donate.confirm-3: Thibitisha mchango wako wa ${{usd}} kwa mwezi
donate.confirm-4: Thibitisha mchango wako wa ${{usd}} kwa mwaka
donate.wallet-label-1: mchango wa ${{usd}} kwa mwezi kwa freeCodeCamp
donate.your-donation: Mchango wako wa ${{usd}} utatoa saa {{hours}} za kujifunza kwa watu kote ulimwenguni.
donate.your-donation-2: Your ${{usd}} donation will provide {{hours}} hours of learning to people around the world each month.
donate.your-donation-3: Your ${{usd}} donation will provide {{hours}} hours of learning to people around the world each year.
donate.duration: Become a one-time supporter of our charity.
donate.duration-2: Become a monthly supporter of our charity.
donate.duration-4: Become a supporter of our charity
donate.progress-modal-cta-1: Donate now to help our charity build a free accredited Computer Science degree for all.
donate.progress-modal-cta-2: Donate now to sponsor 53 hours of server time for our charity's website.
donate.progress-modal-cta-3: Donate now to help our charity translate lessons into 32 languages for learners worldwide.
donate.progress-modal-cta-4: Donate now to support development of our charity's new Python curriculum.
donate.progress-modal-cta-5: Donate now to help our charity design lessons on new programming tools.
donate.progress-modal-cta-6: Donate now to support our charity's open source projects.
donate.progress-modal-cta-7: Donate now to help our charity hire even more amazing teachers.
donate.progress-modal-cta-8: Donate now to help us develop new courses on emerging tools and programming concepts.
donate.progress-modal-cta-9: Donate now to support our math for developers curriculum.
donate.progress-modal-cta-10: Donate now to help us develop free professional programming certifications for all.
donate.credit-card-2: Or donate with a credit card:
donate.need-email: We need a valid email address to which we can send your donation tax receipt.
donate.went-wrong: Something went wrong processing your donation. Your card has not been charged.
donate.valid-info: Please enter valid email address, credit card number, and expiration date.
donate.valid-email: Please enter a valid email address.
donate.valid-card: Please enter valid credit card number and expiration date.
donate.email-receipt: Email (we'll send you a tax-deductible donation receipt):
donate.need-help: Need help with your current or past donations?
donate.forward-receipt: Forward a copy of your donation receipt to donors@freecodecamp.org and tell us how we can help.
donate.efficiency: freeCodeCamp is a highly efficient education charity.
donate.why-donate-1: When you donate to freeCodeCamp, you help people learn new skills and provide for their families.
donate.why-donate-2: You also help us create new resources for you to use to expand your own technology skills.
donate.bigger-donation: Want to make a bigger one-time donation, mail us a check, or give in other ways?
donate.other-ways: Here are many <0>other ways you can support our charity's mission</0>.
donate.failed-pay: Uh - oh. It looks like your transaction didn't go through. Could you please try again?
donate.only-you: Only you can see this message. Congratulations on earning this certification. It's no easy task. Running freeCodeCamp isn't easy either. Nor is it cheap. Help us help you and many other people around the world. Make a tax-deductible supporting donation to our charity today.
donate.get-help: How can I get help with my donations?
donate.very-transparent: Very. We have a Platinum transparency rating from GuideStar.org.
donate.download-irs: You can <0>download our IRS Determination Letter here</0>.
donate.download-990: You can <0>download our most recent 990 (annual tax report) here</0>.
donate.fcc-budget: freeCodeCamp's budget is much smaller than most comparable charity. We haven't brought in professional fundraisers. Instead, Quincy does everything himself.
donate.help-millions: However, on a budget of only a few hundred thousand dollars per year, we have been able to help millions of people.
donate.how-one-time: How can I make a one-time donation?
donate.one-time: Iwapo ungependelea kutoa michango ya mara moja, unaweza kusaidia dhamira ya freeCodeCamp wakati wowote una pesa taslimu. Unaweza kutumia <0>kiungo hiki kuchangia kiasi chochote unachohisi kupitia PayPal</0>.
donate.wire-transfer: Unaweza pia kutuma pesa kwa freeCodeCamp moja kwa moja kupitia uhamishaji wa kielektroniki. Ikiwa unahitaji maelezo yetu ya kielektroniki, tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org
donate.does-crypto: Je, freeCodeCamp inakubali michango katika Bitcoin au sarafu nyinginezo za siri?
donate.yes-cryptocurrency: Ndiyo. Tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org na anaweza kukutumia maelezo ya pochi ya freeCodeCamp. Anaweza pia kukupa risiti ya mchango ikiwa unahitaji kwa ajili ya kodi zako.
donate.yes-check: Ndiyo, tunakaribisha cheki. Unaweza kuituma kwetu kupitia:
donate.how-matching-gift: Ninawezaje kuweka zawadi zinazolingana kutoka kwa mwajiri wangu, au makato ya mishahara?
donate.employers-vary: Hii inatofautiana kati ya mwajiri na mwajiri, na hisani yetu tayari imeorodheshwa katika hifadhidata nyingi kubwa zinazolingana na michango.
donate.some-volunteer: Baadhi ya watu wanaweza kujitolea kwa ajili ya freeCodeCamp na mwajiri wao analinganisha kwa kuchangia kiasi kisichobadilika kwa saa anachojitolea. Waajiri wengine watalinganisha michango yoyote ambayo wafadhili hutoa hadi kiasi fulani
donate.help-matching-gift: Ikiwa unahitaji usaidizi kuhusu hili, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy moja kwa moja: quincy@freecodecamp.org
donate.how-endowment: Ninawezaje kusanidi Zawadi ya Wakfu kwa freeCodeCamp.org?
donate.endowment: Hii itakuwa msaada mkubwa. Kwa kuwa huu ni mchakato unaofanywa kwa mikono zaidi, Quincy anaweza kukusaidia kuupitia kibinafsi. Tafadhali mtumie barua pepe moja kwa moja kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org.
donate.how-legacy: Ninawezaje kusanidi zawadi ya Legacy kwa freeCodeCamp.org?
donate.we-honored: Tungefurahi kutumia zawadi kama hiyo kwa matumizi mazuri kusaidia watu ulimwenguni kote kujifunza kuweka kuprogramu. Kulingana na mahali unapoishi, hii inaweza pia kuwa kodi isiyotozwa ushuru.
donate.legacy-gift-message: Ninatoa, kubuni, na kusia [jumla ya _____ USD (au sarafu nyingine) AU asilimia _____ ya salio na mabaki ya mali yangu] kwa freeCodeCamp.org (Free Code Camp, Inc. nambari ya kitambulisho cha kodi 82-0779546), shirika la hisani lililopangwa chini ya sheria za Jimbo la Delaware, Marekani, ambalo kwa sasa linapatikana 3905 Hedgcoxe Rd, PO Box 250352, Plano, Texas, 75025 Marekani, ili litumike kwa madhumuni yake ya jumla ya kutoa misaada kwa hiari yake.
donate.thank-wikimedia: Tungependa kuwashukuru Wakfu wa Wikimedia kwa kutoa lugha hii rasmi ili tuitumie.
donate.legacy-gift-questions: Ikiwa una maswali yoyote kuhusu mchakato huu, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org.
donate.welcome-stock: Tunakaribisha michango yako ya hisa. Tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy moja kwa moja na anaweza kukusaidia kwa hili, na kushiriki maelezo ya akaunti yetu ya udalali ya hisani: quincy@freecodecamp.org.
donate.how-receipt: Je, ninaweza kupata risiti ya mchango ili niweze kutoa mchango wangu kutoka kwa kodi zangu?
donate.just-forward: Kabisa. Sambaza tu risiti yako kwa donors@freecodecamp.org, tuambie ungependa risiti na maagizo yoyote maalum ambayo unaweza kuwa nayo, nasi tutakujibu pamoja na risiti.
donate.how-update: Ninaanzisha mchango wa kila mwezi, lakini ninahitaji kusasisha au kusitisha ujirudiaji wa kila mwezi. Ninawezaje kufanya hili?
donate.take-care-of-this: Tuma moja ya risiti zako za michango ya kila mwezi kwa donors@freecodecamp.org na utuambie kile ungependa tufanye. Tutakushughulikia na kukutumia uthibitisho.
donate.anything-else: Kuna kitu kingine chochote ninachoweza kujifunza kuhusu kuchangia freeCodeCamp.org?
donate.other-support: Ikiwa kuna njia nyingine ungependa kusaidia shirika letu la kutoa msaada na dhamira yake ambayo haijaorodheshwa hapa, au ikiwa una maswali yoyote, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org.

report.details: Tafadhali toa maelezo mengi iwezekanavyo kuhusu akaunti au tabia unayoripoti.
report.portfolio-2: Je, ungependa kuripoti jalada la {{username}} kwa matumizi mabaya?
report.notify-1: Tutaarifu timu ya wasimamizi wa jumuiya, na kutuma nakala ya ripoti hii kwa barua pepe yako: {{email}}
report.notify-2: Tunaweza kurudi kwako kwa maelezo zaidi ikiwa inahitajika.

404.heres-a-quote: Hatukuweza kupata ulichokuwa unatafuta, lakini hapa kuna nukuu:

search.label: Tafuta
search.try: Unatafuta kitu? Jaribu upau wa kutafutia kwenye ukurasa huu.

misc.offline: Unaonekana kuwa nje ya mtandao, huenda maendeleo yako yasihifadhiwe
misc.server-offline: Seva haikuweza kufikiwa na huenda maendeleo yako yasihifadhiwe. Tafadhali wasiliana na <0>support</0> ikiwa ujumbe huu utaendelea
misc.keep-coding: Chochote unachoendelea nacho, endelea kuandika msimbo!
misc.brand-new-account: Karibu kwenye akaunti yako mpya kabisa ya freeCodeCamp. Tuanze.
misc.duplicate-account-warning: Ikiwa ulitaka kuingia katika akaunti iliyopo badala ya kufungua akaunti hii, <0>bofya hapa ili kufuta akaunti hii</0> na ujaribu anwani nyingine ya barua pepe.
misc.email-blast: By the way, each Friday I send an email with 5 links about programming and computer science. I send these to about 4 million people. Would you like me to send this to you, too?
misc.iframe-alert: Normally this link would bring you to another website! It works. This is a link to: {{externalLink}}
misc.iframe-form-submit-alert: Normally this form would be submitted! It works. This will be submitted to: {{externalLink}}
misc.slow-load-msg: Looks like this is taking longer than usual, please try refreshing the page.

icons.avatar-2: An avatar coding with a laptop

aria.move-preview-to-new-window: Move the preview to a new window and focus it
aria.move-preview-to-main-window: Move the preview to this window and close the external preview window
aria.show-preview: Show the preview in this window
aria.open-preview-in-new-window: Open the preview in a new window and focus it

flash.honest-first: To claim a certification, you must first agree to our academic honesty policy
flash.really-weird: Something really weird happened, if it happens again, please consider raising an issue on https://github.com/freeCodeCamp/freeCodeCamp/issues/new
flash.not-right: Something is not quite right. A report has been generated and the freeCodeCamp.org team have been notified
flash.went-wrong: Something went wrong, please check and try again
flash.account-deleted: Your account has been successfully deleted
flash.not-authorized: You are not authorized to continue on this route
flash.could-not-find: We couldn't find what you were looking for. Please check and try again
flash.wrong-updating: Something went wrong updating your account. Please check and try again
flash.updated-about-me: We have updated your personal information
flash.updated-socials: We have updated your social links
flash.updated-sound: We have updated your sound settings
flash.keyboard-shortcut-updated: We have updated your keyboard shortcuts settings
flash.subscribe-to-quincy-updated: We have updated your subscription to Quincy's email
flash.email-valid: Your email has successfully been changed, happy coding!
flash.bad-challengeId: currentChallengeId is not a valid challenge ID
flash.username-used: Username is already associated with this account
flash.username-taken: Username is already associated with a different account
flash.username-updated: We have updated your username to {{username}}
flash.privacy-updated: We have updated your privacy settings
flash.could-not-logout: We could not log you out, please try again in a moment
flash.email-encoded-wrong: The email encoded in the link is incorrectly formatted
flash.oops-not-right: Oops, something is not right, please request a fresh link to sign in / sign up
flash.expired-link: Looks like the link you clicked has expired, please request a fresh link, to sign in
flash.signin-success: Success! You have signed in to your account. Happy Coding!
flash.social-auth-gone: We are moving away from social authentication for privacy reasons. Next time we recommend using your email address: {{email}} to sign in instead.
flash.name-needed: We need your name so we can put it on your certification. Add your name to your account settings and click the save button. Then we can issue your certification.
flash.incomplete-steps: It looks like you have not completed the necessary steps. Please complete the required projects to claim the {{name}} Certification.
flash.already-claimed: It looks like you already have claimed the {{name}} Certification
flash.cert-claim-success: @{{username}}, you have successfully claimed the {{name}} Certification! Congratulations on behalf of the freeCodeCamp.org team!
flash.wrong-name: Something went wrong with the verification of {{name}}, please try again. If you continue to receive this error, you can send a message to support@freeCodeCamp.org to get help.
flash.refresh-needed: You can only use the PaymentRequest button once. Refresh the page to start over.
flash.username-not-found: We could not find a user with the username "{{username}}"
flash.add-name: This user needs to add their name to their account in order for others to be able to view their certification.
flash.not-eligible: This user is not eligible for freeCodeCamp.org certifications at this time.
flash.profile-private: {{username}} has chosen to make their profile private. They will need to make their profile public in order for others to be able to view their certification.
flash.certs-private: {{username}} has chosen to make their certifications private. They will need to make their certifications public in order for others to be able to view them.
flash.not-honest: {{username}} has not yet agreed to our Academic Honesty Pledge.
flash.user-not-certified: It looks like user {{username}} is not {{cert}} certified
flash.invalid-challenge: That does not appear to be a valid challenge submission
flash.no-links-provided: You have not provided the valid links for us to inspect your work.
flash.provide-username: Check if you have provided a username and a report
flash.report-sent: A report was sent to the team with {{email}} in copy
flash.certificate-missing: The certification you tried to view does not exist
flash.create-token-err: An error occurred while creating your user token
flash.delete-token-err: An error occurred while deleting your user token
flash.token-created: You have successfully created a new user token.
flash.token-deleted: Your user token has been deleted.
flash.start-project-err: Something went wrong trying to start the project. Please try again.
flash.complete-project-first: You must complete the project first.
flash.local-code-save-error: Oops, your code did not save, your browser's local storage may be full.
flash.local-code-saved: Saved! Your code was saved to your browser's local storage.
flash.timeline-private: {{username}} has chosen to make their timeline private. They will need to make their timeline public in order for others to be able to view their certification.
flash.code-saved: Your code was saved to the database. It will be here when you return.
flash.code-save-error: An error occurred trying to save your code.
flash.code-save-less: Slow Down! Your code was not saved. Try again in a few seconds.
flash.challenge-save-too-big: Sorry, you cannot save your code. Your code is {{user-size}} bytes. We allow a maximum of {{max-size}} bytes. Please make your code smaller and try again or request assistance on https://forum.freecodecamp.org
flash.challenge-submit-too-big: Sorry, you cannot submit your code. Your code is {{user-size}} bytes. We allow a maximum of {{max-size}} bytes. Please make your code smaller and try again or request assistance on https://forum.freecodecamp.org
flash.invalid-update-flag: You are attempting to access forbidden resources. Please request assistance on https://forum.freecodecamp.org if this is a valid request.

validation.max-characters: There is a maximum limit of 288 characters, you have {{charsLeft}} left
validation.same-email: This email is the same as your current email
validation.invalid-email: We could not validate your email correctly, please ensure it is correct
validation.email-mismatch: Both new email addresses must be the same
validation.invalid-url: We could not validate your URL correctly, please ensure it is correct
validation.invalid-protocol: URL must start with http or https
validation.url-not-image: URL must link directly to an image file
validation.editor-url: Remember to submit the Live App URL.
validation.http-url: An unsecure (http) URL cannot be used.
validation.own-work-url: Remember to submit your own work.
validation.publicly-visible-url: Remember to submit a publicly visible app URL.
validation.path-url: You probably want to submit the root path i.e. https://example.com, not https://example.com/path

certification.fulltext: <0>This certifies that</0> <1>{{user}}</1> <2>has successfully completed the freeCodeCamp.org</2> <3>{{title}}</3> <4>Developer Certification, representing approximately {{time}} hours of coursework.</4>

project.heading-legacy-full-stack: As part of this Legacy Full Stack certification, {{user}} completed the following certifications:
project.heading: As part of this certification, {{user}} built the following projects and got all automated test suites to pass:
project.no-solution: error displaying solution, email support@freeCodeCamp.org to get help.
project.footnote: If you suspect that any of these projects violate the <2>academic honesty policy</2>, please <5>report this to our team</5>.

title.Build a Tic Tac Toe Game: Build a Tic Tac Toe Game
title.Build a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler Game: Build a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler Game
title.Visualize Data with a Bar Chart: Visualize Data with a Bar Chart
title.Visualize Data with a Scatterplot Graph: Visualize Data with a Scatterplot Graph
title.Visualize Data with a Heat Map: Visualize Data with a Heat Map
title.Show National Contiguity with a Force Di: Show National Contiguity with a Force Directed Graph
title.Visualize Data with a Choropleth Map: Visualize Data with a Choropleth Map
title.Visualize Data with a Treemap Diagram: Visualize Data with a Treemap Diagram

title.javascript-algorithms-and-data-structure: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification
title.back-end-development-and-apis: Back End Development and APIs Certification
title.Legacy Information Security and Quality: Legacy Information Security and Quality Assurance
title.information-security-and-quality-assuran: Information Security and Quality Assurance Certification

certification-card.title: Claim Your Certification
certification-card.intro: Complete the following steps to claim and view your {{i18nCertText}}
certification-card.set-name: Set your name, and make it public
certification-card.set-certs-public: Set your certification settings to public
certification-card.set-profile-public: Set your profile settings to public

forum-help.describe: Describe your issue in detail here.
forum-help.too-long-one: The challenge seed code and/or your solution exceeded the maximum length we can port over from the challenge.
forum-help.too-long-two: You will need to take an additional step here so the code you wrote presents in an easy to read format.
forum-help.too-long-three: Please copy/paste all the editor code showing in the challenge from where you just linked.
forum-help.add-code-one: Replace these two sentences with your copied code.
forum-help.add-code-two: Please leave the ``` line above and the ``` line below,
forum-help.add-code-three: because they allow your code to properly format in the post.

user-token.title: User Token
user-token.create-p1: It looks like you don't have a user token. Create one to save your progress on this section
user-token.create-p2: Create a user token to save your progress on the curriculum sections that use a virtual machine.
user-token.delete-p1: Your user token is used to save your progress on curriculum sections that use a virtual machine. If you suspect it has been compromised, you can delete it without losing any progress. A new one will be created automatically the next time you open a project.
user-token.delete-p2: If you suspect your token has been compromised, you can delete it to make it unusable. Progress on previously submitted lessons will not be lost.
user-token.delete-p3: You will need to create a new token to save future progress on the curriculum sections that use a virtual machine.
user-token.no-thanks: No thanks, I would like to keep my token
user-token.yes-please: Yes please, I would like to delete my token

signout.heading: Sign out of your account
signout.p1: Warning: If you continue, your progress will no longer be saved.
signout.p2: This action will sign you out of your account on this device and browser session only. Please confirm if you would like to proceed.
signout.certain: Yes, sign out of my account
signout.nevermind: Nevermind, I don't want to sign out
